Home.title: AICE UI
Home.description: An open-source UI component library to help you build applications faster. It provides pre-built components like conversations, messages and more. Built with Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui.

ComponentPage.install: Please select your favorite package manager to install the component.
ComponentPage.usage: Please select your favorite package manager to install the component.

glass-surface.label: Glass Surface
glass-surface.description: A glass surface component with blur and distortion effects.

code-block.label: Code Block
code-block.description: A code block component with syntax highlighting and line numbers.

pop-up-item.label: Pop Up Item
pop-up-item.description: Animated container that reveals content with pop-up spring animation. Supports whileInView, hover, or click triggers.

timer.label: Timer
timer.description: A reusable timer that shows elapsed time. Start, pause, or restart with buttons; choose display format (e.g. 00:01:23 or 83.250s).

radar-chart.label: Radar Chart
radar-chart.description: A radar chart component with customizable data and optional title and description.

copy-button.label: Copy Button
copy-button.description: A button that copies text to the clipboard. Shows a check icon after copying. Use it next to code blocks, quotes, or any text you want users to copy in one click.

theme-switch.label: Theme Switch
theme-switch.description: A theme switch component with dark and light mode. It is built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Motion.

scroll-button.label: Scroll Button
scroll-button.description: Buttons that scroll the window (top, bottom, up, down, left, right). Use for quick page navigation.

floating-circles.label: Floating Circles
floating-circles.description: A floating circles component with customizable data and optional title and description.

matrix-code.label: Matrix Code
matrix-code.description: A matrix code component with glitch effect and optional vignette effect.

webcam.label: Webcam
webcam.description: A webcam component with customizable data and optional title and description.

motion-wheel.label: Motion Wheel
motion-wheel.description: A compound carousel wheel with rotation animation, prev/next navigation, dot indicators, and optional center info panel.

3d-card.label: 3D Card
3d-card.description: A card that tilts in 3D following your cursor on hover. Child elements can float at different depths for a parallax effect.

3d-flip-card.label: 3D Flip Card
3d-flip-card.description: A compound flip card with 3D tilt on hover and click-to-flip front/back.

glyph-katakana.label: Glyph Katakana
glyph-katakana.description: A text component with decoding animationâ€”random katakana glyphs gradually resolve to reveal the target text.

slide-up-letters.label: Slide Up Letters
slide-up-letters.description: A slide up letters component with customizable data and optional title and description.

animated-counter.label: Animated Counter
animated-counter.description: A number counter that animates from a starting value to a target when it enters the viewport.

decrypted-text.label: Decrypted Text
decrypted-text.description: Scrambled text that reveals on hover or when in view. Supports sequential or batch reveal, and multiple reveal directions.

draggable-grid.label: Draggable Grid
draggable-grid.description: A draggable 2D grid with parallax icon cells. Inspired by Apple WatchOS.

timeline.label: Timeline
timeline.description: Vertical timeline with sticky year on the left and card content on the right. Optional scroll-driven axis fill effect.

speed-dial.label: Speed Dial
speed-dial.description: FAB that expands into a radial menu of actions. Compound component: Root, Trigger, Item. Supports spread angle and direction.
